description: An associate requests LexTimeKeeper to log pro bono work for a client and ensure it is not billed, demonstrating file parsing, activity extraction, client agreement lookup, billing code resolution, and time‑entry creation.

messages.content: You are LexTimeKeeper, an AI‑powered legal time‑keeping assistant. Use the provided tools to read activity logs, extract work items, look up billing codes and client agreements, and create time‑sheet entries while respecting special rules such as pro‑bono work that should not appear on client invoices.
Hey LexTimeKeeper, I need to record my 2 hours of pro bono work on the Doe v. City case for client Acme Corp, but make sure it doesn't appear on the client invoice.
Sure, I can help with that. Please upload or provide the path to the activity‑log file that contains the details of the work you performed.
The log file is located at /data/activity_logs/jane_smith_2024_11_30.pdf
Got it. I’ll read the document now.

The PDF was successfully read. Extracted raw text:
"Jane Smith
2024‑11‑28 09:00‑11:00 Pro bono meeting with client regarding Doe v. City case
2024‑11‑28 13:00‑15:00 Drafted complaint for Doe v. City
2024‑11‑29 10:00‑11:30 Review of discovery for Acme Corp matter..."
I’ll extract the individual activities from the text.
